A food that has a combination of flavors that are both sweet and spicy, like a spicy mango salsa or a sweet and spicy honey glazed salmon.
A food that has a texture that is both crispy and chewy, like a crispy fried chicken sandwich with a chewy bun.
A food that has a unique aroma that is both enticing and comforting, like a roasted pumpkin soup with a sprinkle of cinnamon.
A food that has a flavor that is both smoky and savory, like a smoked salmon with a dill and lemon sauce.
A food that has a combination of flavors that are both fruity and nutty, like a mixed berry and almond granola bar.
